name: persian-datepicker-element

scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run build:esm && pnpm run minify && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.build:clean: set CLEAN_DIST=true && set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=placeholder.js && npx rspack --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.min.js && set MINIFY=true && npx rspack --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.js && set MINIFY=false && npx rspack --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js
scripts.build:esm: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.esm.js && set MODULE_TYPE=module && set MINIFY=true && npx rspack --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js
scripts.build:optimal: pnpm run build:max-compress && pnpm run build:super-optimize
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npx rspack serve --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js
scripts.analyze: set NODE_ENV=production && set BUNDLE_ANALYZE=true && npx rspack --config scripts/build/rspack.config.js

author: Ahmad Mehrabi
